comment_body: Great story! I’m curious about 2 things. Did he eat his moms eyes? Was she abusing him?
something's missing here...whats with the blood, hammer n nightie?
No to him eating the eyes. As for the abuse, it’s all there in the story...
I think she was "grooming" him to be her lover. Reread the paragraph that begins,"I look at the posters on the wall...." It's all there.
